name: Lotus Boutique Apartments by Peace World

reviews.text: I made a last-minute decision to stay overnight at Port Douglas, and found this little gem online. Danielle has done a marvelous job remodeling these 5 apartments and they feel modern and clean. They are built in a very open style, featuring little half-walls separating the various areas. All of the windows have glass shutters which can be opened to let in the frequent breezes. There is an outdoor spa pool for each apartment and the rooms are light and airy. The value was outstanding, and I plan to return next year if I can! Marvelous!
reviews.title: Wonderful, newly-updated apartments close to a beach!

reviews.text: The property is surrounded by a grey wall, with the name of the property prominently displayed in two areas. Construction is still underway inside the wall, but does not disturb guests. There are several restaurants and shops within a two-minute walk, and parking is available on the property.
reviews.title: A lovely new place
